description:
Vaccines have become one of the sacred myths of 21st century mainstream society.  In order to help us move beyond the old paradigm of duality and hierarchy, we can be aware of the fact that vaccines were never proven to save millions of lives.  In fact, medical research from the 1950s, compiled in the informative Dissolving Illusions, demonstrates that mortality from the illnesses that vaccines were developed for had all significantly declined prior to the advent and popularization of their vaccines.  This applies to Diphtheria, Pertussis (Whooping Cough), Smallpox and Measles.  In fact, Scarlet Fever and Typhoid, both of which did not have vaccines developed, saw their mortality rates brought to virtually zero without a vaccine altogether.  This demonstrates that the supposedly indisputable foundation of modern (Allopathic) medicine is a house of cards.

It is high time that we took control of our physical body and our spiritual body.  The days of entrusting the care of our body and soul to the MDs and the priests or clerics are over.  Those models belong to the antiquated duality and hierarchy of control and have been shown to be false.  To be truly mature, we must take the reigns of our physical and spiritual health.  The time is now.
